suncertify.remote
Class RemoteDataFacadeImpl

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.DataAdapter
      suncertify.remote.RemoteDataFacadeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataFacade, java.rmi.Remote, RemoteDataFacade, java.rmi.server.Unreferenced
public class RemoteDataFacadeImpl
extends DataAdapter
implements RemoteDataFacade, java.rmi.server.Unreferenced

A RemoteDataFacadeImpl object is the implementation of the RemoteDataFacade interface. It is used as a remote object. A RemoteDataFacadeImpl extends the DataAdapter, but is used as a remote object and exposes some more methods. This class acts primarily as a wrapper. Business Methods (book , filter, read) are exposed to the client
